game.title: The Lost Temple
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient artifact from the lost temple.
game.description: The local villagers are in need of assistance to retrieve an ancient artifact from a long-abandoned temple on the outskirts of the village. The temple is said to be filled with treacherous traps and deadly creatures, but the reward will be worth it.

task.objective: Infiltrate the temple and disable the traps.
task.description: The entrance to the temple is guarded by a complex system of pressure plates and poison darts. You must navigate through the traps without triggering them.

task.objective: Retrieve the ancient artifact from the inner sanctum.
task.description: The inner sanctum is filled with treasure, but also guarded by a powerful undead creature. You must defeat the creature and retrieve the artifact.
